Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin

What you'll find here: Programs used by Superuser for administration

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

accounts/
utils for manipulating user accounts
diskusage/
tools for monitoring disk usage and enforcing quotas
frontends/
visual and GUI front ends for system administration
idle/
programs to display/kill idle or greedy users
isp/
specialized administration tools for ISPs
log/
utilities for clearing, rotating, and digesting system logs
login/
tools for handling user logins
nis/
NIS (Network Information System) support
su/
utilities to allow selected users to run root programs
time/
utils for maintaining the system time
